title: Ep 199 | Jase's Best Duck-Hunting Advice, Finding Joy in the Fire & How Do You Love the Unlovable?
description:
Jase reveals the duck-hunting secret that always blows people's minds and somehow manages to get into the mind of a duck. The guys discuss why, as Christians, we're always able to find joy, even in the most turbulent times. Jase spends two days metal detecting in the Arkansas snow. And Phil looks to God's example to answer a question many people have: "How do we love the unlovable?"
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
